data.name: Ultimate Video Player
data.description:
Supports 360, 3D 360 (TB), non-360 videos and spatial audio.

Fully customisable, perfect to create your own white label app for events and presentations.

Once the app is installed launch it once, then restart. This will generate the correct folder structure under "Android/data/com.fieldofvision.UVP/files/" with folders "Sounds", "Videos" and "Images".

Features:

**Hidden settings menu accessible by pulling trigger whilst pointing at the logo, includes the following:
*Custom menu audio
*Custom menu background
*Custom logo in menu
*Customise what happens when user removes HMD (pause video or restart video)
*Video controls (disable/enable)
*Back button to return to menu (disable/enable)
*Loop video (disable/enable)
*Gaze selection (disable/enable)
*Set app into single video mode (skips menu and video automatically plays upon app launch)

Added a new feature to make the menu even cleaner for those production people who like to have long file names:

-Add "=" to your video file name to cut out anything that's after the "=". For example, if your video is "AwesomeFilm_H264_Feature_4K_v15.mp4" simply write ""AwesomeFilm=_H264_Feature_4K_V15.mp4" and the name in the app menu will now be "AwesomeFilm". 

So now you can keep your menu nice and clean for presentations whilst not losing any of the important version data.
